displayName.english: A Good Bot is Hard to Find
displayName.german: Gute Bots sind schwierig zu finden

description.schinese: 完成“波提：字节国度大冒险”
description.tchinese: 完成“波提：字節國度大冒險”

description.brazilian: Liberte os robôs-trabalhadores do seu loop infinito no nível 1
description.english: Release the workbots from their infinite loop in level 1.
description.german: Befreie die Arbeiterbots in Level 1 aus ihrer Endlosschleife.
description.latam: Libera a los bots de trabajo de su bucle infinito en el nivel 1.
description.polish: Uwolnij roboty robocze z ich nieskończonej pętli na poziomie 1
description.schinese: 在关卡1中将陷入死循环的机器工人解放出来
description.tchinese: 在關卡1中將陷入死循環的機器工人解放出來

description.brazilian: Acorde os três robôs-trabalhadores no nível 1
description.english: Wake up three sleeping workbots in level 1.
description.german: Wecke drei schlafende Arbeiterbots in Level 1 auf.
description.latam: Despierta a tres bots de trabajo en el nivel 1.
description.polish: Obudź trzy uśpione boty na poziomie 1
description.schinese: 在关卡1中唤醒三个休眠中的机器工人
description.tchinese: 在關卡1中喚醒三個休眠中的機器工人

description.brazilian: Resgate os três robôs-gatos no nível 2
description.english: Rescue all three missing cat-bots in level 2.
description.german: Bringe alle drei verschwundenen Katzenbots in Level 2 zurück.
description.latam: Rescata a los tres robogatitos en el nivel 2.
description.polish: Zwróć wszystkie trzy koty ich właścicielce na poziomie 2
description.schinese: 在关卡2中救出所有三只失踪的猫咪机器人
description.tchinese: 在關卡2中救出所有三隻失踪的貓咪機器人

description.brazilian: Veja a saga completa do Cata-verme
description.english: Experience the complete saga of the Wormcatcher.
description.latam: Descubre la saga completa de Atrapagusanos.
description.polish: Poznaj całą sagę o Łowcy robaków
description.schinese: 游玩蠕虫捕手的完整传奇
description.tchinese: 遊玩蠕蟲捕手的完整傳奇

description.brazilian: Ouça todas as análises de Coulombot
description.english: Listen to all of Coulombot’s analyses.
description.german: Hör dir alle Analysen von Coulombot an.
description.latam: Escucha todas las deducciones de Coulombot.
description.schinese: 听取库仑吉奇的所有分析
description.tchinese: 聽取庫侖吉奇的所有分析

description.brazilian: Obtenha todos os troféus de deslizadores
description.latam: Consigue todos los trofeos de los toboganes.

description.brazilian: Termine um nível com um gato na cabeça
description.english: Finish a level with a cat on your head.
description.german: Beende ein Level mit einer Katze auf deinem Kopf.
description.latam: Completa un nivel con un gato en la cabeza.
description.polish: Ukończ poziom z kotem na głowie
description.schinese: 头顶着猫咪完成一个关卡
description.tchinese: 頭頂著貓咪完成一個關卡

description.brazilian: Puxe seu amigo com o enganchamento
description.german: Zieh deinen Freund mit dem Hook.
description.latam: Enlaza y atrae a una amistad.
description.polish: Pociągnij swojego przyjaciela za pomocą podpinania
description.schinese: 使用挂钩抓取你的朋友
description.tchinese: 使用掛鉤抓取你的朋友

description.brazilian: Colete mais de 9000 MB em um nível
description.english: Collect more than 9000 MB in one level.
description.german: Sammle mehr als 9000 MB in einem Level.
description.latam: Obtén más de 9000 MB en un solo nivel.
description.polish: Zbierz ponad 9000 MB na jednym poziomie
description.schinese: 在一个关卡中收集超过9000MB的数据
description.tchinese: 在一個關卡中收集超過9000MB的數據

description.brazilian: Em um jogo cooperativo, lance seu amigo para que ele seja deletado
description.english: Throw your co-op buddy to their deletion.
description.german: Sorg dafür, dass dein Koop-Partner gelöscht wird.
description.latam: Elimina a tu amistad lanzándola de un saliente.
description.polish: Wyrzuć swojego kumpla z planszy podpinaniem
description.schinese: 将你的合作伙伴扔到删除区
description.tchinese: 將你的合作夥伴扔到刪除區

description.brazilian: Deslize sem acertar uma única nota
description.english: Slide without hitting even a single note.
description.german: Rutsche, ohne eine einzige Note zu treffen.
description.latam: Deslízate sin acertar ni una sola nota.
description.polish: Przejdź ślizgawkę nie uderzając nawet w jedną nutę
description.schinese: 完成滑行而不碰到任何音符
description.tchinese: 完成滑行而不碰到任何音符

description.brazilian: Fale com todos os robôs-cidadãos no mundo
description.english: Speak with every chatty bot in Byteland.
description.german: Sprich mit allen tratschenden Bürgerbots der Welt.
description.latam: Habla con todos los bots que esparcen rumores sobre tu eliminación.
description.polish: Porozmawiaj ze wszystkimi botami w grze
description.schinese: 与世界所有的市民机器人交谈获取传闻
description.tchinese: 與世界所有的市民機器人交談獲取傳聞

description.latam: Compra todas las extensiones de la base.
description.schinese: 购买所有的中央控制台扩展
description.tchinese: 購買所有的中央控制台擴展

description.brazilian: Termine o jogo no modo multijogador
description.english: Beat the game in co-op mode.
description.latam: Completa el juego en modo cooperativo.
description.schinese: 在多人模式下通关游戏
description.tchinese: 在多人模式下通關遊戲

description.brazilian: Termine uma volta na sua hoverpista particular
description.english: Finish a lap on your private track.
description.german: Beende eine Runde auf deinem privaten Hovertrack.
description.latam: Completa una vuelta con el aerodeslizador en tu circuito privado.
description.polish: Ukończ okrążenie na swoim prywatnym hovertracku
description.schinese: 在私人悬浮轨道上完成一圈
description.tchinese: 在私人懸浮軌道上完成一圈

description.brazilian: Consiga 3 estrelas em todos os níveis.
description.latam: Consiga 3 estrelas em todos os níveis.

description.german: Beende ein Level, ohne respawnen zu müssen.
description.schinese: 通关一个关卡且中途没有复活
description.tchinese: 通關一個關卡且中途沒有復活

description.brazilian: Termine todos os níveis sem ressurgir.
description.german: Beende alle Level, ohne respawnen zu müssen.
description.latam: Termine todos os níveis sem ressurgir.
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie poziomy bez odradzania się
description.schinese: 通关全部关卡且中途没有复活
description.tchinese: 通關全部關卡且中途沒有復活

description.brazilian: Pule em uma lata de lixo.
description.latam: Pule em uma lata de lixo.

description.schinese: 使用拳头击打一个沙堡
description.tchinese: 使用拳頭擊打一個沙堡

description.brazilian: Complete todos os níveis sem pular uma única cinemática.
description.english: Complete all levels without skipping a single cutscene.
description.german: Schließe alle Level ab, ohne eine einzige Zwischensequenz zu überspringen.
description.latam: Complete todos os níveis sem pular uma única cinemática.
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie poziomy bez pomijania ani jednej przerywnika filmowego
description.schinese: 通关全部关卡且不跳过任何过场动画
description.tchinese: 通關全部關卡且不跳過任何過場動畫
